query.statement: SELECT V.ACCTCD, (SELECT ACCTNM6 FROM HLDC_ST_ACCOUNT WHERE ACCTCD = V.ACCTCD) ACCTCDNM, (SELECT DEPT_ID FROM HLDC_ST_UPJANG WHERE UPJANG = V.UPJANG) RTNDEPT_ID, (SELECT MU_NM||' '||CC_NM FROM HLDC_SC_DEPT_V WHERE DEPT_ID = (SELECT DEPT_ID FROM HLDC_ST_UPJANG WHERE UPJANG = V.UPJANG)) RTNDEPT_IDNM, V.BUDDEPT_ID BUDDEPT_ID, (SELECT MU_NM||' '||CC_NM FROM HLDC_SC_DEPT_V WHERE DEPT_ID = V.BUDDEPT_ID) BUDDEPT_IDNM, V.ADITEM1, V.ADITEM2, V.ADITEM3, V.ADITEM4, V.PROJECT_ID, V.BUD_CLS, DECODE(TRIM(V.BUD_CLS), NULL, '', (SELECT BUDCLS_NM FROM HLDC_PL_BUDCLS WHERE ACCTCD = V.ACCTCD AND BUD_CLS = V.BUD_CLS)) BUD_CLS_NM, (CASE WHEN V.ACCTCD IN ('5051819') THEN 'Y' WHEN V.ACCTCD IN ('5050191', '5050122', '5050116', '5050193') AND SUBSTR(#TRX_DATE#, 1, 4) >= '2012' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) YAESAN_CHK, (CASE WHEN V.ACCTCD IN ('5051819') THEN HLDC_PL_BUDGET_REMAIND(SUBSTR(#TRX_DATE#, 1, 4), SUBSTR(#TRX_DATE#, 5, 2), V.BUDDEPT_ID, V.ACCTCD, NVL(V.PROJECT_ID, ' '), NVL(V.BUD_CLS, ' ')) WHEN V.ACCTCD IN ('5050191', '5050122', '5050116', '5050193') AND SUBSTR(#TRX_DATE#, 1, 4) >= '2012' THEN HLDC_PL_BUDGET_REMAIND(SUBSTR(#TRX_DATE#, 1, 4), SUBSTR(#TRX_DATE#, 5, 2), V.BUDDEPT_ID, V.ACCTCD, NVL(V.PROJECT_ID, ' '), NVL(V.BUD_CLS, ' ')) ELSE 0 END) YAESAN_JAN, NVL(V.ADJ_AMT, 0) ADJ_AMT, NVL(V.VAT, 0) VAT, NVL(V.NOPAY_AMT, 0) NOPAY_AMT, V.ADJ_DESC DESCRIPTION_NM, (SELECT VAT_UPJANG FROM HLDC_ST_UPJANG WHERE UPJANG = V.UPJANG) VAT_UPJANG, V.CUSTCD, V.TAX_DATE, V.RCP_GUBUN, DECODE(TRIM(V.RCP_GUBUN), NULL, 0, 1) RCP_CNT, V.RCP_AMT, V.SVC_AMT, V.RCP_CUSTNM, V.RCP_SAUPNO, V.RCP_ADDR, V.RCP_DRNAME, DECODE(TRIM(V.RCP_GUBUN), NULL, '', V.ADJ_DATE) RCP_BALDATE, DECODE(TRIM((SELECT SCHOOL_YN FROM HLDC_ST_UPJANG WHERE UPJANG = V.UPJANG)), NULL, 'N', (SELECT SCHOOL_YN FROM HLDC_ST_UPJANG WHERE UPJANG = V.UPJANG)) SCHOOL_YN, V.ADV_KIND, V.ADJ_KIND, NVL(TRIM(V.BULGONG_YN), 'N') BULGONG_YN, V.ADV_ID, V.GAMU, V.GADATE, V.GANO, V.TAXNO, V.TAX_IF_GB, --DECODE(V.TAX_IF_GB, 'N', '1', V.TAX_SEND_GB) TAX_SEND_GB '1' TAX_SEND_GB FROM MAS_ADVANCE V WHERE (V.ADJ_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#TRX_DATE#, 'YYYYMMDD'), DECODE(SUBSTR(#TRX_DATE#, 7, 2), '25', -1, 0)), 'YYYYMM')||'26' AND #TRX_DATE#) AND (DECODE(SUBSTR(#TRX_DATE#, 7, 2), '25', '001', DECODE(V.ACCTCD, '9410119', '001', V.ADJ_KIND)) IN ('001', '002', '009', '008')) /* 20140418 FC회계팀 이숙자 요청 (잡이익'008'도 분기말에 넘기기로 한다.) */ AND (TRIM(V.GAMU) IS NULL) AND (V.UPJANG = #UPJANG#) ORDER BY V.ACCTCD, V.ADJ_DATE, V.ADV_ID
